      • wrap

        public static org.apache.lucene.search.Filter wrap(org.apache.lucene.search.Query query,
                                   QueryParseContext context)
        Wraps a query in a filter. If a filter has an anti per segment execution / caching nature then @CustomQueryWrappingFilter is returned otherwise the standard QueryWrapperFilter is returned.
